title: Virtual Talk: Family Album
hero_caption: Unknown maker. American, 19th century. Untitled (Portrait of a Man, Woman and Girl), 1856. The W. Bruce and Delaney H. Lundberg Collection, restricted gift of The Phillip Leonian and Edith Rosenbaum Leonian Charitable Trust.
short_description: In this participatory program, educator Sam Ramos explores 19th-century photography to discover what family portraits have to tell us about time, memory, and relationships.
list_description: Explore 19th-century family portraits with educator Sam Ramos.
description:
In this participatory program, educator Sam Ramos explores 19th-century photography to discover what family portraits have to tell us about time, memory, and relationships.

Explore all upcoming Virtual Talks.

This virtual event will be hosted on Zoom. Find Zoom tutorials and resources here. If you have any questions about virtual programming, please reach out to museum-programs@artic.edu.
